sentence: In the poll, 872 registered Georgia voters were asked: If the election were held today and the candidates for U.S. Senate were Democrat Raphael Warnock and Republican Herschel Walker, who would you vote for?
author: Warner Todd Huston
title: Poll: Herschel Walker Holds 3-Point lead over Warnock in Georgia Senate Race

sentence: Also scheduled to appear at the March 26 rally with Trump is former professional and college football star running back Herschel Walker, the clear front-runner in this year's GOP Senate primary in Georgia.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump returning to Georgia to campaign with David Perdue, Herschel Walker
